choose.otherwise: `id` AS `id`, `is_identity_validate` AS `isIdentityValidate`, `is_mail_validate` AS `isMailValidate`, `login_name` AS `loginName`, `login_password` AS `loginPassword`, `nick_name` AS `nickName`, `real_name` AS `realName`, `tele_phone` AS `telePhone`, `recommend_code` AS `recommendCode`, `user_email` AS `userEmail`, `phone_area_code` AS `phoneAreaCode`, `is_tel_validate` AS `isTelValidate`, `user_address` AS `userAddress`, `identity_type` AS `identityType`, `identity_no` AS `identityNo`, `tel_validate_time` AS `telValidateTime`, `mail_validate_time` AS `mailValidateTime`, `type` AS `type`, `status` AS `status`, `user_first_ip` AS `userFirstIp`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `extend1` AS `extend1`, `extend2` AS `extend2`, `extend3` AS `extend3`

mapper.select:
SELECT `id`, `is_identity_validate`, `is_mail_validate`, `login_name`, `login_password`, `nick_name`, `real_name`, `tele_phone`, `recommend_code`, `user_email`, `phone_area_code`, `is_tel_validate`, `user_address`, `identity_type`, `identity_no`, `tel_validate_time`, `mail_validate_time`, `type`, `status`, `user_first_ip`, `update_time`, `create_time`, `extend1`, `extend2`, `extend3` FROM t_user
AND `id` = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND `is_identity_validate` = #{isIdentityValidate,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND `is_mail_validate` = #{isMailValidate,jdbcType=INTEGER}
